divs: sighting detailsi was traveling westbound on i90 at approximately 9pm or so and i noticed fireworks off to my left from the hoffman estates festival and slightly off to the right of the fireworks i saw an orange light coming from that direction moving east\northeast. i see planes all the time including large airliners as well as small planes and at a distance i thought this is what it was. i quickly ruled out a large airliner as it got closer since it appeared to be at about 700 feet so i then thought it could be a small plane until it got even closer and i could see there were no red or blue lights or anything indicative of any plane or helicopter. i could only watch it to the point out my windshield where it went almost directly over my car but it was sufficient to get a clear view of it. my first reaction after ruling out any known aircraft was to think it was some sort of ember from the fireworks display but logically i knew this couldn't be the case as it seemed too large to be anything like that and it travelled fast and steady both horizontally and vertical y relative to any fireworks i could see from the direction it came. it was clear that the rest of the fireworks were doing their own thing and this thing was clearly staying at the same altitude and speed for the time i saw it moving away from the fireworks area. as it came over my car, i struggled to see its shape and i almost call it round but it appeared to have some edges which i might describe as diamond shaped. it had a glow to it, dark orange in the center fading to a lighter orange closer to the outside and then ever so thin maybe a grayish edge although it was hard to tell due to the glow from inside. it was not flickering, bouncing or doing anything weird, it was simply a consistent intensity of a dull dark orange center to a lighter orange around the center travelling at a consistent speed and altitude. i have always had an open-mind to such things and this is the very first time in my 40 years of life i have seen something so inexplicably different. my question is, what was it doing there and where was it going and for what reason? it obviously didn't care that people were seeing it or it wanted to be seen but why?
Summary: Dark orange to light orange object.
